title: Gwyneth Paltrow didn't write a speech for ELLE as she was drunk
text:
Gwyneth Paltrow claimed she was 'too drunk' to prepare a speech on Sunday night when she was honoured at ELLE's Women In Hollywood event.

The bash, which was held at the Four Seasons Beverly Hills saw a host of women being recognised for their roles in film.

But Gwyneth, 47, had the room giggling with her drunken admission, saying she's a 'lame old white lady' as she continued to explain why she wasn't prepared.

'I'm drunk and a lame old white lady': Gwyneth Paltrow didn't prepare a speech when she was honoured at ELLE's Women In Hollywood event at the Four Seasons in Beverly Hills on Sunday

Giggles: She had the room in stitches as she was forced to think of a few words on the spot

Other women who were honoured at the bash included Natalie Portman, 38, and Scarlett Johansson, 34.

Gwyneth looked incredible on the night, wearing a black dress which had a low-cut back and a one-shoulder detail.

Her long beachy blonde waves hung down in loose curls past her shoulders as she posed on the red carpet and she had a big smile on her face.

Stunning: Gwyneth looked incredible on the night, wearing a black dress which had a low-cut back and a one-shoulder detail

Blonde ambition: Her long beachy blonde waves hung down in loose curls past her shoulders as she posed on the red carpet and she had a big smile on her face

Other stylish stars who walked the gala's black carpet included Nicole Kidman, Charlize Theron, Zendaya, Margot Robbie and Diane Lane.

Gwyneth later posted this group shot to her Instagram from later on in the evening.

She wrote: 'Thank you @elleusa for a wonderful evening celebrating women in film.

'Only for you @ninagarcia would I hit the town on a Monday. And thank you to my amazing friends who always show up for me ❤️❤️❤️especially @bensplatt (I love you @bensplatt).'

Meanwhile, Gwyneth admitted in the November edition of ELLE that creating Goop helped her flourish in ways she was not quite so prepared for.

She was one of many celebrities featured on covers of the fashion magazine's Women in Hollywood issue, where she posed topless with just a pair of suspenders and trousers hiding her modesty.
description: Gwyneth Paltrow claimed she was 'too drunk' to prepare a speech on Sunday night when she was honoured at ELLE's Women In Hollywood event.
